content: Are there any plans to include https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/249854-t-community.2Frust-survey-2020/topic/Follow-Up/near/220275188 in the 2021 survey?

So far we only have two questions about binary size: people's perceptions of whether binary sizes are good and if they are getting better or not. We also have other questions asking if folks work in the embedded space, but we won't be able to get very fine grained analysis with what we currently have
We could ask about how people perceive their ability to effectively manage dependencies, but this also doesn't really get at what you're asking.
If you want to open an issue on the surveys repo, that's the best way we can make sure to at least attempt to address it on the survey.
